mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_payment ( member_email, member_sid, member_next_payment, member_payment_check ) VALUES ( #{memberEmail}, #{memberSid}, SYSDATE, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member_payment WHERE TO_CHAR(member_next_payment,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') and member_payment_check = 1
